name: auterity-unified-platform
description: Unified AI Platform with 25+ integrated services

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.security-scan: npm run security-scan:frontend && npm run security-scan:backend
scripts.security-scan:backend: cd backend && python -m bandit -r . -f json -o security-report.json
scripts.quality-gate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security-scan && npm run performance-test
scripts.quality-gate:ci: npm run quality-gate && npm run build
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:generate:api && npm run docs:generate:coverage
scripts.docs:generate:coverage: cd frontend && npm run test:coverage && npx istanbul report html
